document.full_text: a prominent bahraini human rights activist said he had been threatened with rape while in custody after he refused to apologize to the king over his role in anti-government protests.
document.title: bahraini activist said threatened with rape: report
lines_and_colors: a prominent bahraini human rights activist said he had been threatened with rape while in custody after he refused to apologize to the king over his role in anti-government protests.
